name: UIDocumentBrowserAction
desc: A custom action that you can create and add to a document browser's Edit menu or navigation bar.

items.name: init(identifier: String, localizedTitle: String, availability: UIDocumentBrowserAction.Availability, handler: ([URL]) -> Void)
items.desc: Instantiates and returns a new browser action item.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: The action's image displayed in the navigation bar.

items.name: var supportedContentTypes: [String]
items.desc: An array of uniform type identifiers that define the types of documents that the action supports.

items.name: var supportsMultipleItems: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the action can be triggered on more than one document at a time.

items.name: var localizedTitle: String
items.desc: The title that appears in the menu or navigation bar.

items.name: var availability: UIDocumentBrowserAction.Availability
items.desc: A value that defines where the action can appear (in the Edit Menu, the navigation bar, or both).

items.name: struct UIDocumentBrowserAction.Availability
items.desc: Values that determine where the action can appear in the document browser.
